When the Highlight matching brackets option is selected, whenever the cursor is next to a bracket or curly braces, its opening or closing counter part is highlighted. In the Appearance color options table, you can adjust various editor appearance features.

context.description:
Content assist helps you to finish tags or lines of code and insert templates. Depending on the source markup language, the choices that are available in the content assist list are based on tags defined by DTD and schema files, tag library descriptors, or content model standard that is specified for the file being edited. HTML content assist choices are based on the W3C HTML 4.01 content model.
If your cursor is in a position where content assist is available, a pop-up list of available choices is displayed. The content assist list displays all available completions for the current cursor position, including templates. Content assist is also available by pressing Ctrl+Space.
